name: Panda and the True Meaning of Christmas
name_original: Panda and the True Meaning of Christmas
description:
Help Panda uncover the true meaning of Christmas!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to interact

This started as an experiment playing around with building trees by stacking circles (inspired by another PICO-8 game, Duck Duck on the Loose). From there I started playing with making my own pixel art and music, and it sort of grew organically into what it is now. Hope you enjoy!
